title: Riot Need a Gamer Version of Gordon Ramsay.
body:
The reaction Brian got, will be the same reaction we LoL players will get when Gamer Ramsay fixes LoL.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/dwt8LetFRSw?start=220

replies.body:
Sorry, pointing out mistakes is an instant perma ban in lol.

no gordon possible.
